name: Astrodus Affair
overview: A science fiction text adventure created with the Graphic Adventure Creator (GAC) by Mark R. Turner and published originally in 1987. The updated 1989 edition appeared on the June 1989 edition of Commodore Disk User and the game also appeared on the covertape of Your Commodore March 1991. You come to after a great battle in space, can you avoid the security beams, avoid getting sucked into space and the enemy Drygars and rescue your ship, the Astrodeus?
